comments.author: fazal kakar
comments.content:
Fazal-u-rehman kakar Loralai,Dargai Kudazai.

When i fined the lovely history of loralai at google.com.i feel very happy becous i was thinking that our city not have any history it is a rough city in balochistan.

now i am very thank full of you people.can i help you in the local news of our city loralai?

when i can then you should Mail me at-

(red_rose1722@yahoo.com).

thank you,

fazal kakar.

comments.author: Mustafa Changazi
comments.content: 1st of all Salam to of my friendsss and thnx to u all that u r finding something abt Loralai . i m also from Loralai 18/m and now student of 2nd year in Quetta but till 10th class i read in Loralai and i m also born in Loralai . i m so glad that in ” google ” their is also the name of Loralai , and i hope that my friends will provide more informations abt Loralai and i will be thankful of my those friends. if u wanna know something about Loralai or u want to contact to me then message or mail me at ” mustafa4someone@yahoo.com ” . OK thnx to visit this page and take care .

comments.author: dr nasir azim
comments.content: it make me very glad when i also find the name and so good information about my native city.i think it is only due to those who made it possible not only for me .my natives but also for those who want to know and also for those who do not konw about loralai, one thing that i want to mantion here is that all the aspect of information should be covered with pictures and here i will request from all those especially my natives who want to see their city more glorious on this screen should contribute with respect to their feild and knowlegde to the designer of these pages.once again i thanks to all those especially DR MANSOOR who did so much in this regrad and hope that they all will make us happier while seening our city on this screen .THANKS

comments.author: ajab khan kundi
comments.content:
1st of all Salam to of my friendsss and thnx to u all that u r finding something abt Loralai . i m also from Loralai vilige kundi nasar abad ward no #8 and now student of pgd(computer ) in but till 10th class i read in punjab(kot adu) and i m also born in Loralai . i m so glad that in ” google ” their is also the name of Loralai , and i hope that my friends will provide more informations abt Loralai and i will be thankful of my those friends. if u wanna know something about Loralai or u want to contact to me then message or mail me at ” ajabkundi@yahoo.com ” .

ajabkundi@hotmail.com

ajabkundi@excit.com

comments.author: Arend Bosscher
comments.content:
I cherish many good memories of Loralai and its surroundigs which I visited frequently in 76-78 with my good friend mr. Asim Ali from the WAPDA Groundwater Directorate in Quetta. In particular the part of the Loralai river that carried a perennial emerging groundwaterflow where it was lovely swimming

(Watch however the sandfly that finally got me in Gumbaz area)

Feel free to mail me.

comments.author: jalat khan kakar
comments.content: i enjoyed extremely your webpages, GOOD LUCK!

comments.author: shoukat khan kudezai
comments.content: salam to all frndz,it is joyful moment for me that i am reading some information about my native and loovely city in oogle search.There are no words to thanx the google search community,we should tried our best to provide more useful informations with pictures to the internet.One thing more i would like to say about my native city,there is lake of basic edgucation & awareness in my city,the youngster must participate & compete the rest of world in this field,thanx good luck.

comments.author: samad saeed
comments.content:
AOA

I really love the LORALAI geographically and the tridations the peoples have within their matters .

It feels respect and care of each other that i never seen in my voge where i go .

comments.author: Abbas
comments.content:
Attn: The Author (Dr. Mansoor Ahmed) and all other friends

aslaamoalaikum

Sir,

I am unaware of different parts of Quetta CIty. I am looking for my friend who i have lost 3 months back. I m indeed very worried for him. Its just like a matter of life and death for me. I dont remember his exact location in Quetta. but it was some place in Quetta Cantt. Can You please provide me with a list of different areas of Quetta Cantt. He told me the name of the area and road and I already knew that place’s name although i was unaware that it was inside Quetta itself. I thought it to be somewhere around Quetta. The name of the road is also very famous. I remember there was a bomb blast or firing incident on an army convoy last year on that road. its a very famous road. Please do help me sir. I can only offer you prayers for your benovelence.

waslaam

Wasim Abbas

wasimzmail@yahoo.com, itswazim@yahoo.com, wasim512@hotmail.com
